title: Warlock - I Rule The Ruins [4CD Box Set] (2015)
description:
Warlock - I Rule The Ruins [4CD Box Set] (2015)FLAC

Artist: Warlock
Title Of Album: I Rule The Ruins [4CD Box Set]
Year Of Release: 2015
Label (Catalog#): Caroline Records [CAROLR017CD. 5356449]
Country: Germany
Genre: Hard Rock / Heavy Metal
Quality: FLAC
Bitrate: Lossless
Time: 4CD (02:54:44)

I Rule The Ruins is the first collection of all 4 albums that Warlock made for Universal records â€“ they contain bonus tracks where applicable. Formed in 1983 Warlock were a German based heavy metal band who enjoyed commercial success in the mid 80â€™s, the band split up and Doro (the Singer) went on to have a successful solo career. All the albums have been re-mastered and the box contains a booklet with notes by Classic Rockâ€™s Malcolm Dome.
